text: – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Primary school |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Preston’s Road| |Area [ha]|11.03| |Ward|Blackwall and Cubitt Town| |PTAL [2031]|3-6a| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality (small part of the site) z Skyline of Strategic Importance z Flood risk area z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (Millwall and West India Docks, and Blackwall Basin, both adjacent to the site) z Town Centre (Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre) z Tower Hamlets Activity Area (part of the site) z Preferred Office Location (Canary Wharf Fringe) z Tall Building Zone (Canary Wharf) z Archaeological Priority Area (Isle of Dogs, tier 3) z Conservation Area (Coldharbour, part of site, most of the Conservation Area is adjacent to the site) z Statutory listed buildings (Quay Walls, Copings and Buttresses to Import Dock and Export Dock, Grade I; Blackwall Basin, Grade I)|
